H0.text: Which Soviet leader was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1990. Leonid Brezhnev

H2.text: Which Soviet leader was awarded the Nobel Peace Prize in 1990. Andrei Gromyko

A4.text: In 1990, Gorbachev was given the Nobel Peace Prize for his leading role in the peace process which today characterizes important parts of the international community.

A5.text: In 1990, Gorbachev was given the Nobel Peace Prize.
